entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 late this afternoon except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers early this evening and 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
